content: my sister is not an easy person to please she saw a pair of thrummed mittens i was knitting and decided she wanted a pair but she wanted convertible mittens with half-fingers and i couldn t find a pattern that fit her requests so i created this in addition to approximately 220 yards of worsted weight yarn the pattern needs about an ounce of roving to make the thrums ashland bay merino works very well this pattern has not been test-knit so please let me know if you find any errors enjoy
